reviews.review_msg: Much better than Mike Hayden is all i've got to say. Most people think Mike Hayden is god, but I liked Paul more.

He's not a very interesting lecturer as his lectures can be pretty boring. But he is clear and very good and presenting the material. He is quite slow in his pace - which is good for a 4th year physics course. Additionally, his exams a very fair. There are usually proofs from his lecture notes. At least one question from the HW.

One of the best lecturers I've had, he really opens your eyes to the material which encourages fundamental understanding of the topics. He puts a lot of effort in each lecture which allows you to just listen and write or stop and contemplate. Very kind grader with great feedback but tests are hard and his custom assignments are killer but also fun.

I took PHYS421 with him. I am glad that I have received a grade of A with him. I studied daily for at least 6 hours for this course. Sadly, I cannot apply things I learned in class to my own life/career. Although I graduate few years ago, I still remember every single question in the exams.
